message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,500.  I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?  This price reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $11,500? I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and my budget constraints.
